```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readxl)
```

Import EZAPOP (Easy Access to Juvenile Populations: 1990-2020) data by sex for juvenile populations by county for 1990-2020:
```{r import, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
girls_df = read_csv(file = "./data/CAcounty_1990_2020_juvenile_females.csv") 
boys_df = read_csv(file = "./data/CAcounty_1990_2020_juvenile_males.csv") 

girls_df %>% knitr::kable()
boys_df %>% knitr::kable()
```
